ENTER_CREDENTIALS: Enter your credentials to access your account
ENTER_EMAIL_VERIFICATION: Enter your email to receive a verification code.
ENTER_PHONE_VERIFICATION: Enter your phone number to send the verification code
ENTER_OTP_SENT: Enter the 6-digit verification code we sent to
FILL_INFO_CONTINUE: Please fill in your information to continue
PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: Password must be at least 6 characters
LOGIN_REQUIRED_MESSAGE: Please create an account/log in to submit a funding request and track the status of your application.
WHO_WE_ARE_DESC: We’re more than just a car platform. We connect drivers with the best deals, trusted reviews, and a seamless car experience.
OUR_MISSION_VISION_DESC: We aim to democratize access to quality vehicles by building a transparent and trustworthy platform that connects buyers, sellers, and renters. Our vision is to become the world’s most trusted automotive marketplace, where every car transaction is seamless, secure, and satisfying.
WHY_CHOOSE_DESC: We've built our platform around the four pillars that matter most to our customers.
TRUSTED_SECURE_DESC: Every transaction is protected with security and verified listings.
VAST_SELECTION_DESC: Find the perfect vehicle from our extensive network.
SIMPLE_PROCESS_DESC: Browse, compare, and connect easily. No complex steps.
SUPPORT_24_7_DESC: Our dedicated team is always ready to help anytime.
CONTACT_US_DESC: Get in touch with us for more details and assistance.
GET_IN_TOUCH_DESC: We're here to answer your questions and help you find exactly what you're looking for. Reach out anytime!
FINANCE_ANY_USED_CAR_DESC: Finance any car, from any seller, with a payment plan that fits you, in just a few steps.
DRIVE_HOME_DREAM_CAR_DESC:
Find and finance any car with confidence.
 Driftech connects you to 25+ trusted banks and finance companies, compares offers on your behalf, and matches you with the most suitable payment plan, all through a fast, fully digital experience.
FLEXIBLE_PAYMENT_TERMS: Flexible payment plans up to 84 months
COMPETITIVE_RATES: Multiple financing options, one smart platform
AUTO_FINANCE_CALCULATOR_DESC: Calculate your monthly installment in seconds and get a clearer picture of what fits your budget, before you apply
SMART_MATCHING_RATES_DESC: We compare offers from 25+ banks and finance companies to show you the most suitable installment plans based on your financial profile, all in one place.
FAST_APPROVALS_DESC: Apply once, and Driftech handles the rest. Your file is sent to the most suitable partners, with most approvals completed within hours, not weeks.
FLEXIBLE_PLANS_DESC: Choose payment plans up to 7 years, with options for:
WHICH_DRIFTER_DESC: Different lifestyles need different financing solutions. Choose the Driftech plan that matches how, and when you want to drive.
PURCHASE_CAR_3_STEPS: Finance Your Car in 3 Simple Steps
PURCHASE_CAR_3_STEPS_DESC: From choosing your dream car to securing the perfect financing plan, we make the journey simple, fast, and tailored to you.
PICK_CAR_ANYWHERE_DESC: Find the car you want from a showroom, an online listing, or even a private seller.With Driftech, you’re not limited to showroom stock, we help you finance any car you choose.
GET_FINANCING_PLAN: Get Matched with the Right Financing Plan
GET_FINANCING_PLAN_DESC:
Tell us your budget, down payment, and preferred installment period. 
Our Smart Matching system compares offers from 25+ banks and finance companies to recommend the most suitable payment plan for you.
DRIVE_AWAY_HASSLE_FREE_DESC:
We handle the paperwork, coordinate with financing partners, and guide you through every step.
 Once approved, you sign and drive, while keeping your cash flow under control.
TRUSTED_PARTNERS_TITLE: Trusted Partners You Can Rely On for a Seamless Car Financing Experience
TRUSTED_PARTNERS_DESC: We partner with leading banks, financial institutions, and trusted dealers to ensure a smooth, secure, and reliable car financing journey, from approval to delivery.
TRUSTED_PARTNERS_ACCESS_FINANCING: Access financing solutions from 25+ banks and finance companies, all through one smart platform.
SMART_FLEXIBLE_FINANCING: Smart, flexible car financing, matched to your income and lifestyle.
CALCULATOR_DESCRIPTION: Estimate your monthly car payment based on your budget, down payment, and preferred installment period, instantly and accurately
DRIFT_TRADE_DESC: Easily trade in your old car for a new one.
BEST_OFFERS_DESC: Get the best deals and discounts on premium cars.
CERTIFIED_CARS_DESC: All our cars are thoroughly inspected and certified.
PREMIUM_SERVICE_DESC: Experience world-class customer service and support.
SPECIFIC_CAR_QUESTION: Do you have a specific car in mind for financing?
TELL_US_CAR_TYPE: Tell us what type of car you're looking for
NEW_CARS_DESC: Finance brand-new cars from authorized dealers with flexible installment plans, matched to your income and budget.
ELECTRIC_CARS_DESC: Finance electric and hybrid vehicles through selected partners, with plans tailored to availability, usage, and efficiency needs.
IMPORTED_CARS_DESC: Finance imported cars that meet partner requirements, with clear eligibility checks and transparent financing options.
PRE_OWNED_CARS_DESC: Finance inspected used cars from dealers or private sellers, as long as they meet age and condition criteria.
FINANCE_SOLUTIONS_DESC: Connect with our experts to explore car loans, auto financing plans, and personalized financial guidance.
FOOTER_DESC: Discover a wide range of cars that match your style, needs, and budget. Whether you want speed, comfort, or reliability—your perfect ride is one click away.
HAVE_A_QUESTION_OR_NEED_GUIDANCE: Have a question or need guidance?
OUR_TEAM_IS_HERE_TO_SUPPORT: Our team is here to support you and help you make confident financing decisions. Reach out anytime, we're ready to help.
DRIFT_NOW_HEADLINE: Need a fast decision? Drift Now is for customers who are ready to finance and drive immediately, with quick approvals and a streamlined process.
DRIFT_NOW_BULLET_1: Buyers who already chose their car
DRIFT_TRADE_HEADLINE: Want to upgrade your car? Trade in your current vehicle and use its value toward financing your next one, smoothly and efficiently.
DRIFT_FLEET_HEADLINE: One financing plan for multiple cars. Drift Fleet is built for business owners and companies managing more than one vehicle.
DRIFT_SAVE_HEADLINE: Prefer lower interest or keeping more cash on hand? Drift & Save helps you structure your financing for long-term savings and smarter cash flow.
IDENTITY_PHOTOS_DESC: Please upload up to 2 clear photos of your identity (optional):
PHOTO_1_DESC: Photo 1: Front side of ID card or passport
PHOTO_2_DESC: Photo 2: Back side of ID card or passport
MAX_FILE_SIZE: Maximum file size: 4MB per image (JPEG, PNG, WebP only)
INVALID_IMAGES_MESSAGE: You have uploaded only 1 image. Please upload the second image or leave as is:
PLEASE_COMPLETE_REQUIRED_FIELDS: Please complete the required fields before submitting
ALREADY_HAVE_FINANCING_REQUEST: You already have a financing request in process
WAIT_FOR_CURRENT_REQUEST: You already have a financing request in process. Please wait until the current request is processed.
ERROR_OCCURRED_WHILE_SENDING: An error occurred while sending the request
UNEXPECTED_ERROR_OCCURRED: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
HERE_TO_HELP_DESCRIPTION: We're here to answer your questions and help you find exactly what you're looking for. Reach out anytime!
CONTACT_US_WORKSHOP_TITLE: Contact us and visit our workshop
CONTACT_US_WORKSHOP_DESC: Have a question or need help? We're here to listen and assist. Your feedback matters reach out anytime.
CAN_APPLY_NEW_FINANCE: You can apply for new finance requests
NEW_APPLICATIONS_NOT_AVAILABLE: New applications are currently not available
NO_FINANCE_REQUESTS_SUBMITTED: You haven't submitted any finance requests yet.
SUPPORT_DESC: Get help and support for Driftech application
WELCOME_SUPPORT: Welcome to the Driftech application support page!
SUPPORT_DESCRIPTION: If you encounter any issues or have questions about the application, you can contact us through the following methods:
FORM_PLACEHOLDER: [Insert contact form here or link to form page]
FORM_DESCRIPTION: Fill in your details and message and we will respond as soon as possible.
NOTE_1: Please mention the application name and version when contacting to speed up assistance.
NOTE_2: We will try to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.
PRIVACY_POLICY_SUBTITLE: Your privacy matters to us. Learn how we protect and handle your personal information.
POLICY_INTRO_DESC: Driftech EG ("Driftech", "we", "us", or "our") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, share, and protect your information when you use:
POLICY_SERVICES_LIST_3: Any related services, tools, or communication channels (together, the "Services").
POLICY_AGREEMENT_DESC: By using our Services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use the Services.
POLICY_SECTION_1_DESC: Driftech EG is an automotive-fintech platform that helps users finance cars by connecting them with banks, finance companies, and other partners.
POLICY_SECTION_2_DESC: We may collect the following categories of personal data:
POLICY_SECTION_2_1_ITEM_1: Name, national ID/passport details, and date of birth
POLICY_SECTION_2_1_ITEM_2: Contact details (phone number, email address, home/office address)
POLICY_SECTION_2_1_ITEM_3: Employment and income information (employer, job title, salary range, bank statements where needed)
POLICY_SECTION_2_1_ITEM_4: Car preferences and purchase details (car model, price, down payment, payment plan)
POLICY_SECTION_2_1_ITEM_5: Copies of documents needed for financing (ID, driver's license, proof of income, bank details, etc.)
POLICY_SECTION_2_1_ITEM_6: Communication content when you contact us via in-app chat, email, phone, or social media
POLICY_SECTION_2_1_ITEM_7: Any other information you choose to share with us.
POLICY_SECTION_2_2_DESC: When you use the app or website, we may automatically collect:
POLICY_SECTION_2_2_ITEM_1: Device information (device type, operating system, unique device identifiers)
POLICY_SECTION_2_2_ITEM_2: Log data (IP address, app version, access dates and times, pages viewed, interactions)
POLICY_SECTION_2_2_ITEM_3: Usage data (features you use, buttons clicked, time spent in the app)
POLICY_SECTION_2_3_DESC: We may receive information about you from:
POLICY_SECTION_2_3_ITEM_1: Banks, finance companies, insurers, and other partners we work with
POLICY_SECTION_2_3_ITEM_2: Credit-check and verification service providers (for example, to check your creditworthiness where allowed by law and with your consent, if required)
POLICY_SECTION_3_DESC: We use your personal data to:
POLICY_SECTION_3_1_ITEM_1: Create and manage your Driftech account
POLICY_SECTION_3_1_ITEM_2: Match you with suitable financing options from our partners
POLICY_SECTION_3_1_ITEM_3: Process and submit your financing application to selected partners
POLICY_SECTION_3_1_ITEM_4: Communicate with you about your application status and required documents.
POLICY_SECTION_3_2_ITEM_1: Analyze how the app and website are used
POLICY_SECTION_3_2_ITEM_2: Develop new features, products, and services
POLICY_SECTION_3_3_ITEM_1: Send important notifications related to your applications and account
POLICY_SECTION_3_3_ITEM_2: Respond to your questions, support requests, or complaints
POLICY_SECTION_3_3_ITEM_3: Send marketing messages or promotions where permitted (you can opt out at any time).
POLICY_SECTION_3_4_ITEM_1: Verify your identity and prevent fraud or misuse
POLICY_SECTION_3_4_ITEM_2: Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
POLICY_SECTION_3_4_ITEM_3: Protect our rights, property, users, and partners.
POLICY_SECTION_4_DESC: We process your personal data based on:
POLICY_SECTION_4_ITEM_1_DESC: to provide the Services and process your financing applications.
POLICY_SECTION_4_ITEM_2_DESC: for certain activities such as marketing or accessing some third-party data (you can withdraw your consent at any time).
POLICY_SECTION_4_ITEM_3_DESC: to comply with applicable laws, regulations, and requests from authorities.
POLICY_SECTION_4_ITEM_4_DESC: such as improving our Services, preventing fraud, and protecting our business, as long as these interests are not overridden by your rights.
POLICY_SECTION_5_DESC: We may share your personal data with:
POLICY_SECTION_5_1_DESC: Banks, finance companies, leasing companies, and insurers that review and process your application or provide offers to you.
POLICY_SECTION_5_2_ITEM_1: Cloud hosting, data storage, and IT providers
POLICY_SECTION_5_2_ITEM_4: Identity verification, KYC, and credit-check providers (where permitted).
POLICY_SECTION_5_3_ITEM_2: Government authorities, regulators, and law enforcement when required by law.
POLICY_SECTION_5_4_DESC: In connection with a merger, acquisition, sale of assets, or similar transaction, where your data may be transferred as part of the business.
POLICY_NO_SELL_DATA: We do not sell your personal data.
POLICY_SECTION_6_DESC: Your information may be stored and processed on servers located outside your country. Where we transfer data internationally, we take appropriate steps to ensure that your personal data is protected in accordance with applicable data protection laws.
POLICY_SECTION_7_DESC: We keep your personal data only for as long as necessary to:
POLICY_SECTION_7_ITEM_1: Provide the Services and complete your applications
POLICY_SECTION_7_ITEM_2: Comply with legal, accounting, and reporting obligations
POLICY_SECTION_7_ITEM_3: Resolve disputes and enforce our agreements.
POLICY_SECTION_7_RETENTION_DESC: When data is no longer needed, we will delete it or anonymize it in a secure manner.
POLICY_SECTION_8_DESC: We use reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data, including:
POLICY_SECTION_8_ITEM_2: Access controls and authentication for staff and systems
POLICY_SECTION_8_ITEM_3: Secure storage and limited access to sensitive documents.
POLICY_SECURITY_WARNING_DESC: However, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure. While we work to protect your data, we cannot guarantee absolute security.
POLICY_SECTION_9_DESC: Depending on the laws in your country, you may have the right to:
POLICY_SECTION_9_ITEM_1: Access the personal data we hold about you
POLICY_SECTION_9_ITEM_3: Request deletion of your data in certain circumstances
POLICY_SECTION_9_ITEM_4: Object to or restrict certain types of processing
POLICY_SECTION_9_ITEM_5: Withdraw consent where processing is based on consent
POLICY_SECTION_9_ITEM_6: Request a copy of your data in a portable format, where applicable.
POLICY_RIGHTS_CONTACT_DESC: To exercise your rights, please contact us at {{email}}. We may need to verify your identity before responding to your request.
POLICY_SECTION_10_DESC: Our Services are not directed to children under 18 years old, and we do not knowingly collect personal data from them. If we become aware that we have collected data from a child under 18 without proper consent, we will take steps to delete it.
POLICY_SECTION_11_DESC: Our app and website may contain links to third-party websites, apps, or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties. We encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing them with any personal data.
POLICY_SECTION_12_DESC: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. When we do, we will change the "Last updated" date at the top and, where appropriate, notify you through the app, website, or by email. Your continued use of the Services after such changes means you accept the updated policy.
POLICY_SECTION_13_DESC: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact us at:
SUBJECT: Subject
REQUEST_SUBMITTED_MESSAGE: Your support request has been submitted successfully. We will get back to you soon.
